schemes.description: Direct income support scheme providing ₹6,000 per year to small and marginal farmers in three equal installments of ₹2,000 each through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT).
schemes.description_hindi: छोटे और सीमांत किसानों को प्रति वर्ष ₹6,000 की प्रत्यक्ष आय सहायता तीन समान किस्तों में प्रदान की जाती है।

eligibility_criteria.land_holding: Small and marginal farmers owning up to 2 hectares of cultivable land
eligibility_criteria.citizenship: Indian citizen actively involved in agriculture
eligibility_criteria.land_ownership: Land ownership must be registered in official state records
eligibility_criteria.bank_account: Active bank account linked with Aadhaar

schemes.application_process: Online application through PM-KISAN portal (pmkisan.gov.in) or offline through Common Service Centers (CSCs) and state government offices. Complete eKYC verification using Aadhaar is mandatory.
key_features: Direct fund transfer with no middlemen
Funds for seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, and irrigation
Reduced debt burden by eliminating dependence on informal loans
Over ₹3.70 lakh crore disbursed to 11+ crore farmer families since launch

schemes.description: Comprehensive crop insurance scheme providing coverage against natural calamities, pests, and diseases with highly subsidized premiums. Covers yield loss, prevented sowing, post-harvest losses, and localized risks.
schemes.description_hindi: प्राकृतिक आपदाओं, कीटों और बीमारियों के खिलाफ व्यापक फसल बीमा योजना जो अत्यधिक सब्सिडी वाले प्रीमियम के साथ कवरेज प्रदान करती है।
schemes.benefit_amount: Up to ₹60,000 crop insurance cover per farmer

eligibility_criteria.farmer_type: All farmers (owner/tenant) growing notified crops in notified areas
eligibility_criteria.crops_covered: Food crops, oilseeds, horticultural crops, commercial crops
eligibility_criteria.government_subsidy: Government covers remaining premium with no upper limit

schemes.application_process: Apply through commercial banks, cooperative banks, regional rural banks, insurance companies, or Common Service Centers (CSCs). Application must be submitted before crop sowing deadline.
schemes.deadline_date: Kharif: End of July | Rabi: End of December
key_features: Full sum-insured payable without any capping
Coverage for natural disasters: fire, lightning, storms, hailstorms, cyclones, floods
Prevented sowing coverage (up to 25% of sum-insured)
Claims processing within 2 months of harvest
Technology integration: satellite imagery, drones, UAVs for loss assessment
Scheme continues through 2025-26 with ₹69,515.71 crore budget

schemes.description: Revolving credit facility providing short-term loans for crop production, post-harvest expenses, asset maintenance, and consumption needs with highly subsidized interest rates.
schemes.description_hindi: फसल उत्पादन, कटाई के बाद के खर्च, संपत्ति रखरखाव और उपभोग की जरूरतों के लिए अत्यधिक सब्सिडी वाली ब्याज दरों के साथ अल्पकालिक ऋण प्रदान करने वाली रिवॉल्विंग क्रेडिट सुविधा।
schemes.benefit_amount: Up to ₹3 lakh without collateral | Up to ₹5 lakh with annual increments

eligibility_criteria.farmer_type: Owner-cultivators, tenant farmers, sharecroppers, oral lessees
eligibility_criteria.activities_covered: Agriculture and allied activities (dairy, poultry, fisheries)

required_documents: Land records or proof of allied activities
schemes.application_process: Apply through any bank branch or online through participating banks' digital portals. No processing fees for loans up to ₹3 lakh.
key_features: Base interest rate: 7% per annum for loans up to ₹3 lakh
Effective rate: 4% per annum with timely repayment
Revolving credit facility with flexible repayment
No processing fees for loans up to ₹3 lakh
Security: Hypothecation of crop up to ₹2 lakh; land charge above ₹2 lakh

schemes.scheme_name: PM-KUSUM (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyaan)
schemes.scheme_name_hindi: प्रधानमंत्री किसान ऊर्जा सुरक्षा एवं उत्थान महाअभियान
schemes.description: Solar agriculture scheme providing subsidies for standalone solar pumps, grid-connected solar plants, and solarization of existing pumps. Aims to add 34,800 MW solar capacity with farmers earning additional income from surplus power.
schemes.description_hindi: सौर कृषि योजना जो स्टैंडअलोन सौर पंप, ग्रिड-कनेक्टेड सौर संयंत्र और मौजूदा पंपों के सौरीकरण के लिए सब्सिडी प्रदान करती है।

eligibility_criteria.component_a: Individual farmers, groups, cooperatives, panchayats for 500 kW to 2 MW solar plants
eligibility_criteria.component_b: Farmers in off-grid areas for standalone solar pumps up to 7.5 HP
eligibility_criteria.component_c: Farmers with existing grid-connected pumps for solarization

schemes.application_process: Online registration through PM-KUSUM portal (pmkusum.mnre.gov.in). Select Farmer Registration, provide details including name, mobile, Aadhaar, and address. Loan application forms also available on portal.
key_features: Component A: 10,000 MW decentralized grid-connected solar plants
Component B: 14 lakh standalone solar agriculture pumps
Component C: 35 lakh solarisation of grid-connected pumps
Central Financial Assistance: 30% (50% in NE states and hill regions)
Bank financing available to reduce farmer's payment to 10%
Performance-based incentives: ₹0.40 per unit or ₹6.6 lakh per MW for 5 years
Farmers can sell surplus power to DISCOMs

schemes.description: Free soil testing service providing farmers with printed or digital reports on soil nutrients, pH levels, organic carbon, and micronutrients. Includes crop-wise fertilizer recommendations to reduce costs and improve productivity.
schemes.description_hindi: मुफ्त मृदा परीक्षण सेवा जो किसानों को मिट्टी के पोषक तत्वों, पीएच स्तर, जैविक कार्बन और सूक्ष्म पोषक तत्वों पर मुद्रित या डिजिटल रिपोर्ट प्रदान करती है।
schemes.application_process: Contact District Agriculture Office for soil sample collection. Trained personnel collect samples using grid-based methods. Samples sent to government-recognized laboratories for testing. Soil Health Card generated in 22 languages within 7-15 days.
key_features: Testing parameters: NPK (Nitrogen, Phosphorus, Potassium), pH, Organic Carbon
Micronutrients tested: Zinc, Iron, Copper, Manganese, Boron
Available in 22 languages and local units
Increased productivity and reduced cultivation costs

schemes.description: Government-announced minimum prices for 22 agricultural crops ensuring farmers receive fair remuneration. Procurement done through FCI and state agencies at MSP when market prices fall below announced rates.
schemes.description_hindi: 22 कृषि फसलों के लिए सरकार द्वारा घोषित न्यूनतम मूल्य जो किसानों को उचित पारिश्रमिक सुनिश्चित करता है।
schemes.benefit_amount: Guaranteed minimum price for 22 crops (varies by crop and season)

crops_covered.kharif: Paddy, Jowar, Bajra, Ragi, Maize, Tur, Moong, Urad, Groundnut, Sunflower, Soyabean, Sesamum, Nigerseed, Cotton
crops_covered.rabi: Wheat (₹2,585/quintal), Barley, Gram, Lentil/Masur (₹7,000/quintal), Rapeseed-Mustard (₹6,200/quintal), Safflower (₹6,540/quintal)

schemes.application_process: Register at nearest FCI procurement center or state-designated mandi. Bring produce for quality check. Payment made within 48-72 hours through Direct Benefit Transfer to bank account.
schemes.deadline_date: Varies by crop and season (announced before sowing)
key_features: MSP announced before each sowing season by CACP
Procurement by FCI for cereals and coarse cereals
PM-AASHA scheme for pulses, oilseeds, copra (25% production limit)
Cotton Corporation of India for cotton procurement
Jute Corporation of India for jute procurement
Direct payment to farmers' bank accounts
No quantity limits for wheat, paddy, cotton, jute

schemes.scheme_name: PMKSY - Per Drop More Crop (Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana)
schemes.scheme_name_hindi: प्रधानमंत्री कृषि सिंचाई योजना - प्रति बूंद अधिक फसल
schemes.description: Micro-irrigation subsidy scheme promoting water-saving technologies through drip and sprinkler irrigation systems. Focuses on enhancing water use efficiency, increasing crop productivity, and targeting water-scarce regions.
schemes.description_hindi: ड्रिप और स्प्रिंकलर सिंचाई प्रणालियों के माध्यम से जल-बचत प्रौद्योगिकियों को बढ़ावा देने वाली सूक्ष्म-सिंचाई सब्सिडी योजना।
schemes.benefit_amount: Subsidy on drip and sprinkler irrigation systems (varies by state, typically 40-55%)
schemes.application_process: Apply online through state agriculture department portal or visit District Agriculture Office. Submit application with required documents. After approval, install system through empaneled vendors. Subsidy credited after installation verification.
key_features: Sprinkler types: portable, micro, mini, semi-permanent, large volume
Micro-level water storage and conservation activities
Increased crop productivity and farmer income
Employment opportunities for skilled and unskilled workers
Updated 2025 Operational Guidelines with detailed specifications

schemes.description: Pan-India electronic trading portal networking 1,473 APMC mandis across 23 states and 4 UTs. Provides transparent online trading, real-time price discovery, and online payment directly to farmers' bank accounts.
schemes.description_hindi: 23 राज्यों और 4 केंद्र शासित प्रदेशों में 1,473 एपीएमसी मंडियों को जोड़ने वाला अखिल भारतीय इलेक्ट्रॉनिक ट्रेडिंग पोर्टल।
schemes.benefit_amount: FREE registration | Better price realization through transparent trading
schemes.application_process: Register online at enam.gov.in. Select registration type (farmer/trader). Enter personal and bank details. Upload required documents. Complete KYC verification. Start trading on integrated mandis.
key_features: 1,473 mandis integrated across 23 states and 4 UTs
Transparent online trading with enhanced market accessibility
Real-time price discovery for stable price realization
Online payment directly to farmers' bank accounts
Access to commodity price information via mobile app
Efficient supply chain and warehouse-based sales
Government grants up to ₹75 lakh per mandi for infrastructure
Trained mandi analysts provided for one year

schemes.description: Cluster-based organic farming scheme providing end-to-end support from production through certification and marketing. Offers ₹31,500 per hectare over 3 years for organic inputs, certification, training, and marketing support.
schemes.description_hindi: क्लस्टर-आधारित जैविक खेती योजना जो उत्पादन से लेकर प्रमाणन और विपणन तक समग्र सहायता प्रदान करती है।

eligibility_criteria.farmer_type: Indian citizen aged 18 years or above
eligibility_criteria.cluster_requirement: Minimum 50 farmers with 20 hectares total land
eligibility_criteria.farming_type: Willing to adopt organic farming practices

schemes.application_process: Form a farmer group with at least 50 farmers. Contact District Agriculture Officer. Submit Aadhaar, bank details, and land documents. Upon approval, receive funds through Direct Benefit Transfer in phases over 3 years.
key_features: ₹15,000/ha for on-farm and off-farm organic inputs (via DBT)
NPOP (National Programme for Organic Production) certification for exports
PGS-India (Participatory Guarantee System) for domestic markets
Cluster-based approach for economies of scale

schemes.description: Gujarat state crop insurance scheme providing financial assistance to farmers who suffer crop losses due to natural calamities. No premium required from farmers. Covers drought, unseasonal rains, heavy rains, floods, and locust attacks.
schemes.description_hindi: गुजरात राज्य फसल बीमा योजना जो प्राकृतिक आपदाओं के कारण फसल नुकसान झेलने वाले किसानों को वित्तीय सहायता प्रदान करती है।
schemes.benefit_amount: ₹20,000 per hectare (33-60% loss) | ₹25,000 per hectare (>60% loss)

eligibility_criteria.farmer_type: 8-A landholders and Forest Right Act recognized farmers
eligibility_criteria.calamities_covered: Drought, unseasonal rains, heavy rains, floods, locust attacks
eligibility_criteria.premium: No premium or enrollment fee required

required_documents: 8-A land records or Forest Right Act certificate
schemes.application_process: Apply online through e-gram centers on Gujarat Agriculture Department portal (agri.gujarat.gov.in). No income criteria restriction. Assistance transferred directly to bank account within 30 days of application approval.
schemes.deadline_date: Apply within specified period after calamity declaration
key_features: Direct Benefit Transfer to bank accounts
Expected to benefit 56 lakh farmers across Gujarat
Automatic coverage for all eligible farmers
State government fully funds the scheme
Compensation based on crop loss percentage

schemes.description: Gujarat state scheme providing daytime electricity to farmers for agricultural activities between 5:00 AM and 9:00 PM. Utilizes solar and non-conventional energy sources to ensure reliable power supply for irrigation.
schemes.description_hindi: गुजरात राज्य योजना जो किसानों को कृषि गतिविधियों के लिए सुबह 5:00 बजे से रात 9:00 बजे तक दिन के समय बिजली प्रदान करती है।
schemes.benefit_amount: Daytime electricity supply (5 AM - 9 PM) for agricultural use

eligibility_criteria.farmer_type: All farmers involved in agricultural activities

schemes.application_process: Apply offline at nearest Gujarat electricity board office with required documents including identity proof, land ownership proof, and passport-sized photographs.
key_features: Operating hours: 5:00 AM to 9:00 PM (currently 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM)
98% of substations shifted to daytime operations
Reduced dependence on conventional power lines

schemes.description: Gujarat state farm mechanization scheme providing financial assistance for tractor purchases. Offers 25% subsidy on tractor cost to promote agricultural mechanization and reduce manual labor.
schemes.description_hindi: गुजरात राज्य कृषि यंत्रीकरण योजना जो ट्रैक्टर खरीद के लिए वित्तीय सहायता प्रदान करती है।
schemes.benefit_amount: Up to 40 HP: 25% or ₹45,000 (whichever is less) | 40-60 HP: 25% or ₹60,000 (whichever is less)

eligibility_criteria.tractor_source: Must purchase from authorized dealers of empaneled manufacturers

schemes.application_process: Apply online through I-Khedut Portal (ikhedut.gujarat.gov.in). Select AGR-50 scheme. Upload required documents. Purchase tractor from empaneled dealer. Submit invoice for subsidy claim. Subsidy credited to bank account after verification.
key_features: Subsidy for tractors up to 60 PTO HP
Up to 40 PTO HP: 25% of cost or ₹45,000 (whichever is less)
Above 40 to 60 PTO HP: 25% of cost or ₹60,000 (whichever is less)
Reduces manual labor and increases efficiency
Part of broader Krishi Yantra Subsidy Yojana
